response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Given its significance and quality, I am offering it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive exceptional value while allowing us to share in the appreciation of this remarkable product. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 1200000}
